div.p: K76/1416, unit 874, VPRS 3991/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

note.p: Form completedby G. Luehmann and signed by M.

div.p: To the Honorable the Chief Secretary

I have the honor to submit for approval the following Estimate *
of Expenditure during the Quarter ending 31st March 1876.

Total — Two hundred pounds
−
shillings and
−
pen
